classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

color.description: The color of the component. It supports both default and custom theme colors, which can be added as shown in the palette customization guide.
color.description_zh: 组件的颜色。它支持默认和自定义主题颜色，可以按照调色板自定义指南中所示进行添加。
color.type: primary| secondary| error| info| success| warning| string

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

disabled.description: If true, the label, input and helper text should be displayed in a disabled state.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则标签、输入和帮助程序文本应以禁用状态显示。

error.description: If true, the label is displayed in an error state.
error.description_zh: 如果为 true，则标签以错误状态显示。

focused.description: If true, the component is displayed in focused state.
focused.description_zh: 如果为 true，则组件以聚焦状态显示。

fullWidth.description: If true, the component will take up the full width of its container.
fullWidth.description_zh: 如果为 true，则组件将占用其容器的整个宽度。

hiddenLabel.description: If true, the label is hidden. This is used to increase density for a FilledInput. Be sure to add aria-label to the input element.
hiddenLabel.description_zh: 如果为 true，则标签处于隐藏状态。这用于增加 FilledInput 的密度。请务必将 aria-label 添加到输入元素。

margin.description: If dense or normal, will adjust vertical spacing of this and contained components.
margin.description_zh: 如果密集或正常，将调整此组件和包含组件的垂直间距。

required.description: If true, the label will indicate that the input is required.
required.description_zh: 如果为 true，则标签将指示需要输入。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。
